New Records: Quinton de Kock smashed his fourth century of the World Cup
Key Match Events: South Africa beat New Zealand by 190 runs
Quinton de Kock (114) and Rassie van der Dussen (133) hit tons
Marco Jansen (3-31) and Keshav Maharaj (4-46) took key wickets
Pre-Game Insights: There is no relevant pre-game insights in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Temba Bavuma said South Africa's performance was 'clinical', 'Will Young (33) and Daryl Mitchell (24) offered any resistance for New Zealand', 'South Africa captain Temba Bavuma said the big partnership really set it up for the boys.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa leapfrog India to the top of the standings
South Africa will meet India at Eden Gardens in Kolkata on Sunday night
New Zealand are still in the hunt for a place in the semi-finals in fourth
Others: South Africa's victory helped them avoid the Indian side in the last four
